Name: DUST - A Post Apocalyptic RPG
About the game: A survival game with randomly generated events, that will challenge your decision making in each situation. It has been inspired by classic post apocalyptic role playing games such as: Fallout and Wasteland series. Every decision you make in the game has consequences that can result in success or death, both in short term or long term. FEATURES - A deep system that us easy to pick up and play, but difficult to master. - Unlock new character that can be customized to your own personal play style, through: attributes, skills, perks, armor, weapons and other equipment. - Scavenge and trade equipment, carefully plan what to carry with you when exploring the radioactive wasteland. - Choose what missions and quest to pursue. Discover valuable information from wasteland dwellers; that helps your survival. - This apocalyptic radioactive wasteland is unforgiving. Make decisions that will affect your chances to stay alive. - Discover new settlements, abandoned locations, ancient relics, mutants and monsters that hide the lost post apocalyptic world. - Experience an atmospheric apocalyptic world; that has an old school gritty environments, accompanied with mastery composed apocalyptic soundtrack. - The game receives constant updates with new content, expansions, big fixes and balance and itâ€™s easy to get in contact with the developer.
